title: When someone picks a very off meta pick, but somehow carries with it
body:
http://stuffpoint.com/funny-gif/image/360707-funny-gif-funny-face.gif

Pantheon support? Darius ADC? The advantage of being in low elos is anything can technically work lol

replies.body: So off meta that you manage to bring a character from another game to the rift.

So off meta, you play League of Legends on a Nintendo Switch
http://orig11.deviantart.net/2036/f/2012/255/5/d/tragic_mistake_by_karbo-d5ee9cy.jpg

Pantheon support is meta
I always go Pantheon adc or supp

"are you playing ad soraka?"
"yeah man, fuck you thought, how do you think i got mastery 6?"
I remember trying to help my friend when he first made an account, so I made a new account to play with him and played stuff like marksman soraka and marksman janna and still fucked people up.
Lol, nice. I think these weird picks that carry are often diamond smurfs just fucking with us silvers lol

I would say 80% are probably smurfs having fun 20% are people that want to experiment mostly those experiments fail but some do work and become meta eventually. You never know conventional wisdom is a funny thing. If everyone thinks something is bad many people will just never try to touch the champ instead of trying him with new builds or in different positions which could make all the difference.
JG Lux OP :D Long range ganks. Oooh MF mid / top, sometimes Mage Fortune. OP, more OP than AD Fortune. Trust me, I play loads of Fortune.
AP Miss Fortune is certainly fun. Especially with {{item:3146}}

To be fair, you were against low elo players so I think you guys we're playing against dumb-dumbs.
http://i0.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/000/782/935/ce2.png
So.....
https://media.makeameme.org/created/HAVE-A-NICE-lrgawt.jpg

Off-meta players be like
https://i1.rgstatic.net/blog/files/2015/12/NeverTellOdds.gif?noredirect

Everyone on their team be like
http://sliptalk.s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/12/17183749/starwars3.gif?noredirect
Support LB ftw....now if only I still actually played this game.
They can try to stop me, but AP Thresh midlane has worked once, so it will work again.
